blog.name: wolfnight2012
blog.title: It's Only Natural
blog.description: Not really sure what i'm supposed to do with my life now that school's over. Pretty much just post whatever suits my fancy. I'll tag things on request, it's no bother!

tags: this movie might get me back into fanfic writing no lie
i need to write a carol & fury reunion & a carol/fury/goose reunion
summary: Anyways, now I want a re-release of all of the MCU films featuring Nick Fury with Goose added into all of Fury’s scenes “Think...
body:
Anyways, now I want a re-release of all of the MCU films featuring Nick Fury with Goose added into all of Fury’s scenes

“Think you’re the only super hero in the world?’ Fury turns to face Tony & an orange cat steps between his boots to look up knowingly at Tony.

Fury & Tony talking in Tony’s Malibu home, they’re having a mini-stare down, a small mew interrupts them. Tony breaks the stare as an orange cat jumps up & settles itself on Fury’s lap. Fury pays it no mind, but picks it up one handed, forearm supporting it’s belly, hand supporting it’s chest, as Howard’s research is brought in.

Steve beating his frustrations into a punching bag, takes a small respite and is pulled from his thoughts by a meow. An orange cat sits neatly on the edge of the boxing ring, Fury steps into the room. “Did you bring me a house-warming gift?”

“What, the cat? No, Goose stays with me.” When Fury leaves, the cat diligently pads after him.

An orange cat roaming freely in the hellicarrier. Just so happens to be crossing the same hallway as Loki when he’s being taken to his cell, Loki flinches, they stare at east other until his guards force him off the screen.

After Fury’s “Coulson still believed in hero’s speech” Goose jumping onto the table & rubbing his head against Fury’s knuckles, purring sadly. 

Maria Hill leading Steve’s team to Fury’s bedside, Goose curled at Fury’s side. She glares at Steve & starts to arc up, hissing, before Fury runs a hand down her back & murmurs “It wasn’t his fault, I had a plan” and she settles again.

Or Goose roaming SHIELD halls, coming to stop at Fury’s office, where Pierce is. She hops up on the desk and meows at him. Pierce chuckles & says “I miss him too” before reaching to pet her. She leaps off the desk & runs off instead & he mutters “Stupid cat”

A shot of some Hydra goons running down a hallway to during the 3rd act, they freeze at the sight of Goose blocking the opposite end of the hall. Maybe one of them suggests shooting Fury’s precious pet, another doesn’t want to hurt a cat & gets down on one knee to coo at her. Goose pads toward them, off screen, & the audience just hears thrashing & screams of horror, the camera panning over to Goose crouching alone with a single gun lying at her paws. She hurries off stage.

Goose perching on the tractor, betraying Fury’s present to Tony. Goose letting Tony pet her & Tony asking how retirement is “Suiting them” with Fury joking (or not) that Goose “Misses the action”

Just, give me more Goose! Give me more Goose & Nick, he clearly adopts her at the end of Captain Marvel!

summary: Captain Marvel vs Alita by Dimitri100 There has been a lot of talk about female heroes in movies recently. Some see it as a good...
caption:
Captain Marvel vs Alita by Dimitri100

There has been a lot of talk about female heroes in movies recently. Some see it as a good thing, some don´t- Though it would be interesting to see what values and flaws each one of these heroines recently hold against each other. For this Vs part here, I kinda just wanted to create a fun scenario for this kind of outcome. Who do you you think should deserve the win of this fight? Personality, I think I am on Alita´s side

Deviantart: https://www.deviantart.com/dimitri100

summary: THIS HAS VAGUE SPOILERS FOR CAPTAIN MARVEL
body:
THIS HAS VAGUE SPOILERS FOR CAPTAIN MARVEL

Nick Fury was CHARMING in Captain Marvel. I loved the movie even though I misnamed it as Captain America like four times (and was duly corrected).

Monica was adorable and perfect and I wanted to hug her and kiss her forehead. Maria was great as well. Badass, gorgeous and super amazing. I only wish we had seen more of them both. Although I know it’s unlikely I would love to see them in future movies and get explored more.

Brie Larson’s acting was amazing! Entertaining, funny and on the nail!

All in all, I loved the movie and had a great day watching it!

But I don’t remember how Fury lost the tesseract?

🤷‍♀️

tags: (it's stated in the art book for captain marvel)
summary: Like most people (I guess) I assumed the gym we see Yon-Rogg and Carol train at is a part of the Kree Military/Starforce - but...
body: Like most people (I guess) I assumed the gym we see Yon-Rogg and Carol train at is a part of the Kree Military/Starforce - but it’s not. It’s a local gym at the bottom of lower Hala where Yon has been going to since he was a child. He’s been going there forever, it’s “his” place, so that’s where he takes Vers. He shares his place with her instead of using the gyms of the military.

He shares his place with her instead of using the gyms of the military.

It’s a local gym at the bottom of lower Hala where Yon has been going to since he was a child. He’s been going there forever, it’s “his” place, so that’s where he takes Vers. He shares his place with her instead of using the gyms of the military.

blog.name: icyindigoposts
blog.title: Can anybody find me somebody to love?
blog.description: Laura, 19, Capricorn, I make terrible decisions. I mostly post about Marvel. Sometimes other things slip in.

tags: i can't even laugh at these people anymore
summary:
'Captain Marvel doesn't have a character I can relate to.'
Well, dude. Many times when I watch a movie I feel this.
'I get it...
body:
‘Captain Marvel doesn’t have a character I can relate to.’

Well, dude. Many times when I watch a movie I feel this.

'I get it women want representation and they want to relate to characters, but I think Cap. Marvel was a little bit extreme for this, don’t you think?’

Yeah, a literal God, a genius billionaire, a doctor who joined a cult or a King from Africa is relatable for you.

reblog.comment:
‘Captain Marvel doesn’t have a character I can relate to.’

Yeah, a literal God, a genius billionaire, a doctor who joined a cult or a King from Africa is relatable for you.
trail.content:
‘Captain Marvel doesn’t have a character I can relate to.’

Well, dude. Many times when I watch a movie I feel this.

'I get it women want representation and they want to relate to characters, but I think Cap. Marvel was a little bit extreme for this, don’t you think?’

Yeah, a literal God, a genius billionaire, a doctor who joined a cult or a King from Africa is relatable for you.

blog.name: elyalovi
blog.title: El ya lo vi
blog.description: La realidad es una basura, por eso me gusta la ficción. creo que la vida es una canción.

summary:
#CaptainMarvel: El momento “Come as you are” que no fue 

Pese a que “Captain Marvel” no sigue los patrones establecidos por el...
caption:
#CaptainMarvel: El momento “Come as you are” que no fue

Pese a que “Captain Marvel” no sigue los patrones establecidos por el MCU tampoco acuña un estilo propio. Apela a la nostalgia noventenera y tiene giros interesantes, como la historia de los Skrulls que termina siendo un paralelo interesante a la tragedia de los refugiados. Tiene uno de los mejores soundtracks, inclusive está a la par de los volúmenes 1 y 2 de “Guardians of the Galaxy”, pero a los 30 segundos de escuchar el intro, la canción se corta o no aportan a la secuencia. Teniendo en cuenta que las escenas de acción son bastantes pobres, estando bien decoradas con el fondo no hubiera sido tan evidente. A esto hay que sumarle que a la película le falta un momento icónico como el de “No man’s Land” en “Wonder Woman” de Patty Jenkins y fácil hubiera habido un momento “Come as you are” solo si la canción hubiera durado toda la secuencia desde que Carol se enfrenta a la Suprema y luego a los Kree. “Come as you are” de Nirvana es el himno de “Captain Marvel” como “Immigrant” de Led Zeppelin es el de Thor. La canción de la banda más emblemática de los 90’s también habla de la identidad, de la percepción de otros y de uno mismo. “Ven como eres, como eras, como quieres ser, como una amiga, como un viejo enemigo”.

-> #CaptainMarvel: La “Rogue One” de Marvel
